long_description: Designed for stability during high-output activities, the women's Gregory Maya 10 Pack is just the right size to carry your water, a shell and food for mountain biking or a quick day hike. Women-specific design. Main compartment has 2 mesh organizer pockets with a key clip. Front pocket with bungee closure. Stretch external pockets with easy-pull tab. 2 external side pockets; dual quick-access hipbelt pockets. The Gregory Maya 10 Pack features a sunglasses stash on the shoulder harness.
short_description: Designed for stability during high-output activities, the women's Gregory Maya 10 Pack is just the right size to carry your water, a shell and food for mountain biking or a quick day hike.
